name: Which restaurants are open on Thanksgiving?
description: If you plan on dining out this Thanksgiving, be sure to contact restaurants to see what their hours will be. And if you’ll be eating at a local favorite, see if reservations are required.
article_text: "while many families come together to celebrate thanksgiving by sharing a feast and expressing gratitude toward each other not all american families celebrate the holiday also not everyone has the time or talent to prepare a thanksgiving feast and not everyone wants to deal with the stress that can come with holiday gatherings this year leave the stress in the kitchen and head to one of the many restaurant chains open on the holiday and with turkey being  more expensive this year you might even save some money here are some of the restaurant chains that will be open on thanksgiving day side note if you plan on dining out this thanksgiving be sure to contact restaurants to see what their hours will be and if youll be eating at a local favorite see if reservations are required applebees black angus steakhouse boston market cracker barrel dennys golden corral hooters ihop maggianos marie callenders mccormick and schmicks ruby tuesday ruths chris tgi fridays waffle house a few pizza places are open on thanksgiving dominos pizza little caesars pizza mod pizza papa johns pizza pizza hut some fast food chains are also open on thanksgiving if youre just looking for a quick bite instead of a full meal burger king bojangles cook out dunkin donuts el pollo loco hardees krispy kreme mcdonalds popeyes qdoba sonic starbucks steak n shake wendys white castle photos byistockgiphypostmatesgoogle web story bycamille dash thanksgiving dinner discounts abound at walmart aldi and other supermarket chains how inflation could affect the price of your christmas tree"

name: Aldi Is Selling Thanksgiving Essentials at 2019 Prices
description: Don't overpay for your holiday meal essentials. Find out how to save up to 30% at Aldi by shopping money-saving Thanksgiving Price Rewind deals.
article_text: "if you havenampxt started shopping for essentials for your turkey day feast youampxre in luck you can plan to shop at your local aldi store to save big on thanksgiving ingredients the affordable retailer is doing a thanksgiving price rewind and will sell holiday favorites at  prices despite inflation doing your shopping at aldi could result in significant savings discover this credit card has a rare  welcome bonus more these  intro apr credit cards made our bestof list alert highest cash back card weampxve seen now has  intro apr for  months aapl stz tsla amzn from nov  through nov  aldi customers can shop thanksgiving price rewind deals this holiday promotion is an excellent way to get financial relief during a difficult time select holiday food and drink essentials will be available at  prices with discounts of up to  while cruising the aisles look for thanksgiving price rewind icons to find discounted items examples of qualifying products include cornbread stuffing brownandserve rolls brie cheese prosciutto and apple pie while not all turkey day essentials will be discounted you can use alidampxs weekly flier to plan your shopping list and find other affordable deals if you have yet to stop up on holiday meal essentials you may want to plan to shop at aldi hopefully moneysaving deals like this will help more people put a delicious thanksgiving meal on the table regardless of their current financial struggles youampxre not alone if you feel uneasy about your financial situation this holiday season many families are changing how they celebrate the holidays to save money changing your holiday routine is okay and it could make your celebrations more affordable here are a few ways to trim your spending without missing out on a fun holiday meal readour free review"

name: 'Mystery Science Theater 3000' announces Thanksgiving marathon titles
description: "Mystery Science Theater 3000" announced titles for their Thanksgiving 2022 marathon on Tuesday. "MST3K" "Turkey Day" Marathon begins at 7 a.m. EST on Nov. 24.

name: Thanksgiving dinner discounts abound at Walmart, Aldi and other supermarket chains
description: As the consumer-price index for food surged 11.4% in September, some supermarket chains are offering Thanksgiving dinner deals.
article_text: "walmart press release walmarts turkeys were going for about  cents a pound though they were sold out online at press time compare that to wholesale turkey prices which were at more than  a pound in october the turkey can be redeemed while supplies last between nov  and nov   shoppers can choose between a whole frozen turkey fresh or frozen turkey breast frozen roasting chicken frozen lasagna a smoked ham plantbased roasts or a tofu turkey heres how much netflix disney and other streaming services now cost why its a good thing that  of homes will pay no federal income tax this year"

name: Thanksgiving Day Parade-themed Bengals bobblehead featuring Who Dey available from FOCO
description: FOCO announced that a Thanksgiving Day Parade-themed Cincinnati Bengals bobblehead featuring mascot Who Dey on a float is available at FOCO.com. The 7-inch bobbleheads are limited to 222 units, and retail for $80 each.

name: Delta preparing for 5 million passengers over Thanksgiving week
description: Delta Air Lines is preparing to handle more than 5 million passengers over Thanksgiving week, one of the busiest travel periods of the year and what is expected to be the heaviest
article_text: "eedition sign up for email newsletters sign up for email newsletters eedition \t\t\ttrending\t\t atlanta  delta air lines is preparing to handle more than  million passengers over thanksgiving week one of the busiest travel periods of the year and what is expected to be the heaviest thanksgiving traffic delta has seen since the start of the pandemic were seeing tremendous demand delta ceo ed bastian said tuesday during a keynote speech at an international air safety summit in downtown atlanta the thanksgiving period will present a major test not only for delta but all major airlines which struggled to handle crowds of travelers over the summer atlantabased delta canceled hundreds of flights as passenger demand rebounded from the depths of the recession and blamed staffing issues that prompted it to slash flights although the airline has been hiring more staff new employees have had to go through training and gain experience in their jobs we pushed a little too hard bastian said we had to scale back but bastian pledged that the airline will be prepared for the holiday rush saying the airline has hired  employees since the start of  still travelers better pack their patience this holiday season fuller planes for delta and other airlines will mean crowds in airports long security lines and wait times congested airport parking lots and frustrations for travelers the american hotel ampampamp lodging association said it expects more travelers in hotels this thanksgiving with a survey showing  of travelers over the holiday plan to stay in hotels up from  last year the survey also showed that  of respondents are less likely to fly this holiday season as a result of concerns about delays and cancellations the thanksgiving and christmas travel season also comes as the pilots union pushes for a new labor contract at delta delta pilots last month voted overwhelming in favor of authorizing union leaders to call a strike in the event negotiations come to a head the pilots union would have to clear a number of hurdles before it would be granted the right to strike under the railway labor act which governs airline and rail labor relations before a strike would be allowed the national mediation board would have to decide further mediation would not be successful release the two sides from mediation and offer arbitration followed by a day cooling off period during an appearance on nbcs today show on monday bastian said theres no possibility pilots could go on strike at thanksgiving or christmas were actually a lot closer than people like to think in terms of trying to get this deal done hopefully soon that rankled delta pilots union leader jason ambrosi who told pilots in a memo we are committed to exercising our legal rightsup to and including a strike if necessary to achieve an industryleading agreement the traveling public is watching and should be wary of blanket assurances from airline executives we invite you to use our commenting platform to engage in insightful conversations about issues in our community we reserve the right at all times to remove any information or materials that are unlawful threatening abusive libelous defamatory obscene vulgar pornographic profane indecent or otherwise objectionable to us and to disclose any information necessary to satisfy the law regulation or government request we might permanently block any user who abuses these conditions sign up for email newsletters copyright   medianews group"

name: How Costs for Thanksgiving Travel Have Changed This Year
description: No matter your transportation method, whether it's booking a flight, riding the train or renting a car, the price of Thanksgiving travel has increased significantly since last year. Holiday
article_text: "this being said the cost for thanksgiving travel will only get more expensive the longer you delay your flight according to hopper airline tickets are expected to rise  each day starting november  a cost breakdown provided by online travel agency kayak details the average car rental across major us metropolitan cities in los angeles california for example the average car rental price per day is  a  decline from  the bad news as some may already have guessed is the savings in car rental expenses are going toward paying for gas fortunately savvy travelers can keep their road trip plans and save on gas by downloading gas apps like gasbuddy to find affordable gas stations along your route and fill up your tank for less travelers attempting to avoid crowded airports or long drives may decide to take the train for their thanksgiving trip forbes reported the average coach ticket for an amtrak roundtrip train is creeping up in price as well if youre traveling from orlando to new york expect to pay around  some train rides may be a bit more affordable depending on your destination travelers in new york heading to charlotte north carolina for example will average  for their ticket price a coach ticket also includes additional perks that amtrak cheekily alludes to airlines being unable to provide all passengers these perks include free checked and carryon bags reclining seats plenty of legroom a big picture window and no middle seat more from gobankingrates"

name: Free Thanksgiving meal ‘One Table Huntsville’ planned downtown
description: One Table Huntsville – a free, shared Thanksgiving season meal to bring Huntsvillians closer together – is set for Nov. 21 in Big Spring Park.
article_text: "one table huntsville  a free shared thanksgiving season meal to bring huntsvillians closer together  is set nov  in big spring park all of huntsville is invited to promote unity and diversity during this time of rapid growth and expansion throughout the city just in time for the holiday season according to a village of promise statement the meal will make meaningful connections in this city thats now voted the  place to live according to the village of promise statement all are invited to come share a meal with someone new food is provided free of charge and the table is for everyone the event runs from  am to  pm the meal is catered and there will be a vegan option if it rains first baptist church  governors drive will host the event village of promise is a family advancement center founded to help children and families in highpoverty neighborhoods its mission is to help families advance out of the cycle of poverty using a two generational approach the center offers educational programs individually targeted to help families in four key areas of their lives education social and emotional growth physical health and wellness and professional development  advance local media llc visit alcom distributed by tribune content agency llc"

name: The best individual NFL performances on Thanksgiving Day
description: As Americans across the country gear up for their next Turkey Bowl, let's check out the best individual Thanksgiving Day performances in NFL history.
article_text: "thanksgiving day and football go together like freshcut turkey and stuffing thanksgiving football is a timeless tradition celebrated by many as americans across the country gear up for their next turkey bowl letampxs check out the best individual thanksgiving day performances in nfl history no you wonampxt find your uncleampxs fivetouchdown game from last yearampxs turkey bowl on this list but since the dallas cowboys and the detroit lions play every thanksgiving expect to see them a lot on this list"

name: Restaurants open for Thanksgiving
description: The restaurant hosts a three-course family-style prix fixe Thanksgiving dinner, served noon to 5 p.m. for $59 adults ($25 younger than 10). The meal includes a mixed green salad and antipasto board to start.
article_text: "maybe you are tired of cooking perhaps your crowd is too big for your table or too small to eat a whole bird on thanksgiving or it could be that you are just too busywhatever your reason for dining out theres a long island restaurant ready to welcome you make your reservations early to get your first choice of time and venue here are some standout eateries  the essential guide to long island dining"
